title: Eco Design & Circularity
overview: Eco-design and circularity minimise waste and resource use, and are critical for supply chain professionals seeking sustainability and efficiency. These approaches ensure products are designed for reuse, reducing costs and environmental impact while aligning with global eco-conscious trends. Product redesign is identified as foundational for implementing sustainable supply chains, fundamentally changing what supply chain operations must handle through expanded circular loops and recycling streams compared to traditional linear models.
